1370: Didderic was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Scilla at age 25 in 1370.
Had a son with Scilla, Didderic, at age 25.
1372: Had a daughter with Scilla, Volcwiif, at age 27.
1374: Lost his wife Scilla while she was giving birth to Lutbrandus in 1374.
Lost son Didderic when Didderic was 5 years old.
1375: Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 4 years old.
1387: Lost son Lutbrandus when Lutbrandus was 14 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
